name: Depths of Space (TurboG)
description:
Depths of Space is a 360 degrees retro looking space ship shooter game.

W: move forward 

S: move backwards

A/D: Control directions

Space: Fire

Esc: Quit game

Enter: Start game

  • Background by Deep-Fold https://deep-fold.itch.io
  • Music by Nicole Marie T https://nicolemariet.itch.io

Thank you to all content provider artists on itch.io.
